item.title: 道达尔能源首席执行官与莫桑比克领导人讨论液化天然气项目
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）讨论了恢复莫桑比克一个重要液化天然气项目的问题。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne discussed the resumption of a key liquefied natural gas project in Mozambique, according to the African nation’s new president.】

item.title: 泰国总理将寻求习近平帮助缓解中国游客的担忧
item.description: 泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）表示，她将在下周访华期间与中国国家主席习近平会面，以解决游客对东南亚国家安全的担忧。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said she will meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping during her visit to China next week, in a bid to address concerns of tourists over safety in the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 西门子能源在强劲开局后上调现金流指引
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）上调了今年的现金流预期，此前该公司第一财季的收入和利润均超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Siemens Energy AG increased its cash flow outlook for the year after the company’s revenue and profit beat analysts’ estimates in its fiscal first quarter.】

item.title: Investcorp 重用老将 Lopez-Cruz 担任全球私募股权投资主管
item.description: Investcorp Holdings 表示，丹尼尔-洛佩斯-克鲁兹（Daniel Lopez-Cruz）将重新加入这家中东最大的另类资产管理公司，担任私募股权投资全球主管，而在他离开一年多后，他成立了一家咨询公司。【原文：Investcorp Holdings said Daniel Lopez-Cruz is rejoining the Middle East’s biggest alternative asset manager as global head of private equity, just over a year after he left to set up an advisory firm.】

item.title: 亚洲底特律 "目标受挫，2024 年泰国汽车销量因贷款紧缩下降 26
item.description: 由于更严格的银行贷款审批和高额的家庭债务挤压了需求，泰国国内汽车销量下滑至 14 年来最低点，损害了其 "亚洲底特律 "的声誉。【原文：Thailand’s domestic automobile sales slumped to the lowest in 14 years, denting its reputation as the “Detroit of Asia,” as demand was squeezed by stricter bank-loan approvals and high household debt.】

item.title: 石破茂的日本央行人选将首次让两名女性担任董事
item.description: 日本央行的决策委员会可能首次有两名女性成员，这标志着日本央行在努力追赶全球同行的同时，朝着改善性别多元化迈出了微弱的一步。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to have two women on its decision-making board for the first time, marking a modest step toward improving gender diversity at the central bank as it struggles to catch up with global peers.】

item.title: ING 出售俄罗斯业务将承受 7 亿欧元利润损失
item.description: ING Groep NV 同意以未披露的价格出售其俄罗斯业务，并在入侵乌克兰三年后有效地退出该国，这将导致 7 亿欧元（7.3 亿美元）的利润损失。【原文：ING Groep NV agreed to sell its Russian business for an undisclosed price and effectively exit the country three years after it invaded Ukraine, resulting in a €700 million ($730 million) hit to profit.】

item.title: 贷款机构 Colesco 首项战略突破 8 亿欧元里程碑
item.description: Colesco 是一家致力于可持续投资的私人借贷公司，作为探索环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）投资的私人信贷基金管理公司，该公司首次收盘就筹集了超过 8 亿欧元（8.39 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Colesco, a private lending firm dedicated to sustainable investing, has raised over €800 million ($839 millon) for its first close as private credit fund managers explore ESG investments.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金受困于关税、DeepSeek 货币冲击
item.description: 据市场参与者称，关税风险的上升、科技领域潜在的斯普特尼克时刻以及迫在眉睫的假期让整个亚洲的对冲基金和其他货币交易商不知道该下什么赌注。【原文：Rising tariff risks, a potential Sputnik moment in tech and looming holidays have left hedge funds and other currency traders across Asia unsure of just what bets to make, according to market participants.】

item.title: 意大利公司获得凯雷现金，据称为游艇和葡萄酒厂买单
item.description: 2020 年，凯雷集团同意向位于威尼斯附近的家族造纸和包装公司 Pro-Gest SpA 提供约 2 亿欧元（约合 2.1 亿美元）的私人债券，这似乎是一个低风险的赌注。【原文：It seemed like a low-risk bet when in 2020 Carlyle Group Inc. agreed to provide around €200 million ($210 million) in private bonds to Pro-Gest SpA, a family-owned paper and packaging company based near Venice.】

item.title: 据称国泰将向空中客车和波音公司订购新的宽体客机

item.title: 巴基斯坦央行行长表示，物价缓和为降息提供了空间

item.title: 洛根表示，持有 66% 债务的债权人同意大修计划

item.title: 客户寻求人工智能工具，SAP 云增长超出预期
item.description: SAP SE 公布的第四季度云计算销售额略高于分析师预期，因为这家欧洲最大的技术公司凭借新的人工智能功能赢得了客户。【原文：SAP SE reported fourth-quarter cloud sales that slightly beat analysts’ expectations, as Europe’s biggest technology company won customers with new artificial intelligence capabilities.】
